item.title: Nia add a quote by Robertson Davies
item.description: "The eye sees only what the mind is prepared to comprehend." -- Robertson Davies

item.title: Nia add a quote by Henri Bergson
item.description: "To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly." -- Henri Bergson

item.title: Nia add a quote by Henri Bergson
item.description: "Think like a man of action, act like a man of thought." -- Henri Bergson

item.title: Nia add a quote by Henri Bergson
item.description: "The idea of the future, pregnant with an infinity of possibilities, is thus more fruitful than the future itself, and this is why we find more charm in hope than in possession, in dreams than in reality." -- Henri Bergson

item.title: Nia add a quote by Henri Bergson
item.description: "The pure present is an ungraspable advance of the past devouring the future. In truth all sensation is already memory." -- Henri Bergson

item.title: Nia add a quote by Henri Bergson
item.description: "A situation is always comic if it participates simultaneously in two series of events which are absolutely independent of each other, and if it can be interpreted in two quite different meanings." -- Henri Bergson
